```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

		--with-curl \

		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \

	&& ./configure \

		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean

#### `055982a49322e225dc0749f6a62e42d2ca64418c29bc192f4f6d5e35b03beb70`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `055982a49322e225dc0749f6a62e42d2ca64418c29bc192f4f6d5e35b03beb70`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \

		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `0a4fecd5d792b5ad8176a7c08aa5497b4887493a9c350cc59c32161933260d80`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \

	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \

	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \

		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `055982a49322e225dc0749f6a62e42d2ca64418c29bc192f4f6d5e35b03beb70`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \

		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `055982a49322e225dc0749f6a62e42d2ca64418c29bc192f4f6d5e35b03beb70`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \

	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \

	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \

	&& gpg --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \

	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME"* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \

		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```
